title: 605: THE 6 RICHEST PEOPLE IN THE CRYPTO INDUSTRY!! PAUL TUDOR JONES CALLS BITCOIN ‘100% CERTAIN’!!
description:
The Coin Bureau YouTube channel launched an investigation and reached credible conclusions. To make this fair, they focused on people who hold most of their assets in cryptocurrencies. That makes people like Coinbase’s Brian Armstrong and MicroStrategy’s Michael Saylor ineligible, because most of their fortunes are tied to their companies. 

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
